physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features four ladies. Three of them are sitting down and looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. A cabin takes up the background of the photograph. A lady can be seen standing in the porch of the cabin.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows three Indo Eurasian women in sarong kebayas seated at a table in front of  Cabine de Planteurs de Cacao van Houten, with a woman standing behind. 

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of three seated Indo Eurasian women and a standing woman
subject_terms_1: group portraits women (female humans) Peranakan folk costume cabins (houses)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Women Log cabins Eurasians Ethnic costume
